articles.description: A Jonny Bairstow century was again at the heart of some England batting heroics, but there was a key difference to events at Headingley compared to Trent Bridge.
articles.content:
England's thrilling final-day win at Trent Bridge, awesome though it was, had a somewhat anticlimactic air to it.
England's stunning turnaround on day two at Headingley - another spectacular Jonny B… [+6084 chars]

articles.description: The Ivorian arrives on a four-year contract.

articles.title: Wayne Rooney quits as Derby County boss - 'The club needs fresh energy' - Sky Sports
articles.description: Wayne Rooney has quit as Derby boss, admitting the club needs someone with "fresh energy" to lead them in what is an uncertain period regarding the ownership.
articles.content:
